nodes.text: Derm Worrit was a male Aqualish thug of Borvo the Hutt's Borvo's thug who operated out of the Borvo Bunker outside of Theed on the planet Naboo during the time of the Galactic Civil War. At some point after the Battle of Yavin, he planned to smuggle spice in Theed with Fenrol Jarkey. Circa 1 ABY, agents of the Royal Naboo Security Forces Violent Crimes Division interrogated him about his relationship with Hunnos Jarkey, a wanted murderer.

Derm Worrit was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
